attributes.action: Fully investigate the role of all artificial sweeteners in the current obesity epidemic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Artificial Sweeteners (Particularly ASPARTAME) stimulate appetite and create cravings for carbohydrates.   A USA based study established that eliminating ASPARTAME from the diet resulted in an average weight loss of 19lbs per participant.  No other weight loss regime was included.  The obesity epidemic in the USA started very soon after Aspartame was released to the market but we should check all artificial sweeteners.
